channel.title: The ban system
channel.description: As you may know if you've been here for any considerable amount of time, the forum gets a lot of downtime. This was caused when a ban was added, however this has been improved dramatically and instead of 10+ minutes of downtime, it's now only a few seconds. This means we [b]will[/b] be handing out bans much, MUCH more, and [b]ANYONE[/b] caught evading a punishment will be banned. No exceptions.

item.title: The ban system
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

As you may know if you’ve been here for any considerable amount of time, the forum gets a lot of downtime. This was caused when a ban was added, however this has been improved dramatically and instead of 10+ minutes of downtime, it’s now only a few seconds. This means we will be handing out bans much, MUCH more, and ANYONE caught evading a punishment will be banned. No exceptions.

Read full topic
